fields.name: is_locked
fields.comment: Prevents posting to this period when locked

fields.name: branch_id
fields.comment: Branch where this journal was entered (for audit & permissions)

fields.name: reversal_of_journal_id
fields.comment: Links to the original journal if this is a reversal

fields.name: accounting_branch_id
fields.comment: Branch this line belongs to for GL reporting (can differ from header branch_id)

fields.name: amount
fields.comment: Positive for Deposit, Negative for Withdrawal

fields.name: rule_value
fields.comment: JSON array of IDs, or specific type code

fields.name: sign_reversal
fields.comment: Flip sign for display (e.g. Sales as positive)
